moves.4... d5 5. Bg5 Be7 6. Nf3 Nc6 7. a3 a5 8: Ouch! I win a pawn with the discovered attack
moves.9... Nxd4 10. Qd1 Nxf3+ 11. Qxf3 axb4 12: Leaving the queen side rook unguarded paved the way for me to grab some pawns
moves.13. O-O c4 14. Be2 b3: I opted to push the b pawn so that it has a supporting pawn rather than grabbing the a pawn which can be captured later
moves.15. Rd1 h6 16. Bf4 Ba4 17. Rd2: Mistake!  17...Ne4 leaves the rook to go to only two places b2 or d4. Either way Bf6 claims a rook
